Usai dari Masjid Quba, Marbut-Majelis DKI Wisata Sejarah ke Gunung Uhud
06 Nov 2019, 15:50 by Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo
Madinah - Setelah mengunjungi Masjid Quba, jemaah umrah marbut dan majelis taklim DKI Jakarta berwisata sejarah ke Gunung Uhud. Jemaah mengenang kisah Perang Uhud yang menyebabkan puluhan kaum muslimin meninggal dalam keadaan syahid.
Bus yang membawa rombongan marbut dan majelis taklim DKI tiba di kawasan Gunung Uhud, Madinah, Rabu (6/11/2019) sekitar pukul 10.30 waktu setempat. Jemaah langsung mendekat ke pemakaman para syuhada yang meninggal saat Perang Uhud.
Marbut dan majelis taklim DKI ikut mendoakan para sahabat yang mati syahid. Doa dipimpin oleh pembimbing umrah, Ali Wardah.
Ali menjelaskan Perang Uhud merupakan salah satu perang yang memiliki banyak pelajaran bagi kaum muslim. Jumlah pasukan kaum muslim dan kafir Quraisy saat itu berbeda jauh.
"Bisa dibayangkan 1.000 banding 3.000, kemudian di tengah perjalanan, 300 orang dari kaum muslimin berbelok arah. Mereka munafik sehingga jumlah dari para sahabat yang bersama Rasulullah waktu itu sekitar 700 orang. Sekarang perbedaannya luar biasa 700 dibanding 3.000," kata Ali.


Foto: Marbut dan majelis taklim DKI umrah (Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo/detikcom)

Ali menjelaskan Baginda Rasulullah SAW kemudian mengatur strategi untuk memenangkan Perang Uhud. Rasul menempatkan sejumlah pemanah di Bukit Rumat.
"Rasulullah berpesan jangan turun, jangan meninggalkan bukit ini dalam keadaan apapun, kalah atau menang sebelum ada aba-aba, jangan turun dari bukit," kata Ali.
Kemudian terjadilah peperangan antara kaum muslimin dan kauf kafir Quraisy. Karena menempatkan pemanah di Bukit Rumat, kaum muslimin menguasai medan perang. Banyak kaum kafir yang tewas dalam peperangan itu.
"Dan orang-orang kafir ini melarikan diri serta mereka meninggalkan hartanya supaya memudahkan untuk berlari," ujar dia.


Foto: Marbut dan majelis taklim DKI umrah (Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo/detikcom)

Namun para pemanah ini tak mengindahkan perintah Rasul untuk tak meninggalkan Bukit Rumat. Mereka mengambil harta yang ditinggalkan kaum kafir Quraisy.
"Mereka turun dari bukti dan mengambil harta-harta tersebut. Kemudian melintaslah Khalid bin Walid. Di mana Khalid bin Walid itu masih dalam keadaan kafir. Dan Khalid bin Walid memimpin orang-orang kafir Quraisy. Sehingga Khalid bin Walid ini mengarahkan pasukannya untuk menggantikan tempatnya kaum muslimin yang ditinggalkan. Pasukan Khalid bin Walid menempati bukit pemanah, Bukit Rumad. Sedangkan kaum muslimin sudah turun di antara Bukit Uhud," ujarnya.
Posisi tersebut menyebabkan kaum muslim yang awalnya menang berbalik kalah. Medan tempur dikuasai kafir Quraisy. Puluhan kaum muslim mati syahid dalam peperangan itu.
Ali menjelaskan ada pesan penting dalam kisah Perang Uhud ini. Menurut Ali, Allah mengingatkan kaum muslim untuk tidak mencintai dunia melebihi akhirat.
"Mengenai Perang Uhud ini. Allah SWT mentarbiyah para sahabat karena mereka meninggalkan sabda Rasulullah serta mereka tidak mendengarkan apa yang diperintahkan Rasulullah. Maka Allah uji dengan kelelahan. Allah uji dengan kekalahan merupakan tarbiyah atau pendidikan dari Allah SWT," ujarnya.

After the Quba Mosque, Marbut-Majelis DKI History Tour to Mount Uhud
Nov 6 2019, 15:50 by Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo
Madinah - After visiting the Quba Mosque, the congregation of Umrah Marbut and the DKI Jakarta Taklim Assembly toured history to Mount Uhud. Congregation remembers the story of the Battle of Uhud which caused dozens of Muslims to die in martyrdom.
The bus carrying marbut and DKI taklim assemblies arrived at the Mount Uhud area, Medina, Wednesday (11/06/2019) around 10:30 local time. Congregation immediately approached the cemetery of the martyrs who died during the Battle of Uhud.
Marbut and DKI taklim council joined in praying for friends who were martyred. The prayer was led by the Umrah guide, Ali Wardah.
Ali explained that the Uhud War was one of the wars that had many lessons for Muslims. The number of troops of the Muslims and Quraysh at that time differed greatly.
"You can imagine 1,000 to 3,000, then on the way, 300 people from the Muslims turned the direction. They were hypocritical so that the number of the friends who were with the Prophet at that time around 700 people. Now the difference is extraordinary 700 compared to 3,000," Ali said.


Photo: Marbut and DKI umrah taklim assembly (Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo / detikcom)

Ali explained His Majesty the Prophet (PBUH) then arranged a strategy to win the Uhud War. The Apostle placed a number of archers on Mount Rumat.
"The Messenger of Allah advised not to go down, do not leave this hill under any circumstances, lose or win before there is an order, do not go down from the hill," Ali said.
Then there was a battle between the Muslims and the Quraysh infidels. Because they placed archers on Mount Rumat, Muslims controlled the battlefield. Many infidels died in the war.
"And these infidels run away and they leave their property to make it easier to run," he said.


Photo: Marbut and DKI umrah taklim assembly (Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo / detikcom)

But these archers did not heed the Apostle's order not to leave Mount Rumat. They took the property left by the Quraysh infidels.
"They descended from the evidence and took the property. Then Khalid bin Walid crossed. Where Khalid bin Walid was still in a state of infidels. And Khalid bin Walid led the Quraish infidels. So Khalid bin Walid directed his troops to replace his place. "the Muslims left behind. Khalid bin Walid's troops occupied the archer hill, the Rumad Hill. While the Muslims had descended among the Uhud Hills," he said.
This position caused the Muslims who initially won to lose. The battlefield was controlled by the Quraish infidels. Dozens of Muslims were martyred in the war.
Ali explained that there was an important message in the story of the Battle of Uhud. According to Ali, Allah reminded Muslims not to love the world beyond the afterlife.
"Regarding this Battle of Uhud. Allah SWT blessed the companions because they left the words of the Messenger of Allah and they did not listen to what the Messenger of Allah commanded. Then Allah tests with exhaustion. Allah tests with defeat is tarbiyah or education from Allah," he said.
